price: àwọn tí wọ́n sọ al-Ƙur’ān di ìpínkúpìn-ín,¹
footnotes: 1. Ẹ wo bí àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ ṣe pín al-Ƙur’ān sí ìpínkúpìn-ín nínú sūrah al-’Anbiyā’; 21:3-5.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
